ComicInfo.Summary:
Ember is making her triumphant return, joining up with the Lookers, in a new series starting this month! But we wanted to do something special to give everyone a chance to be caught up with the Ember story. Christian Zanier, the creative mastermind behind Ember, is re-mastering all the pages from #0 for a Beautified edition, and even adding a couple red hot NEW pages! "Beautified" is our name for variant INTERIOR ARTWORK, with less clothes and more erotic! So the story just got more nude. Every page is different than the standard edition, not just variant covers! Christian Zanier has created an amazing four-part connecting cover set for this issue reflecting all the key parts of Ember's story - Fashion, Fame, Ignition and Inferno! There are clothed and nude covers for each, all that connect to form one giant image! Limited to just 500 copies for each cover!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- FC | Fashion Cover, Limited to 500 | Christian Zanier | 1 | FC | Fame Cover, Limited to 500 | Christian Zanier | 3 | IC | Ignition Cover, Limited to 500 | Christian Zanier | 4 | IC | Inferno Cover, Limited to 500 | Christian Zanier | 5 | FNC | Fashion Nude Cover, Limited to 500 | Christian Zanier | 6 | FNC | Fame Nude Cover, Limited to 500 | Christian Zanier | 7 | INC | Ignition Nude Cover, Limited to 500 | Christian Zanier | 8 | INC | Inferno Nude Cover, Limited to 500 | Christian Zanier | 9 | FCAC | Fashion Century Adult Cover, Limited to 100 | Christian Zanier | 10 | FCAC | Fame Century Adult Cover, Limited to 100 | Christian Zanier | 11 | ICAC | Ignition Century Adult Cover, Limited to 100 | Christian Zanier | 12 | ICAC | Inferno Century Adult Cover, Limited to 100 | Christian Zanier | 13 | GL | Gold Leather Variant Cover | ? | 2 |
